occupation: Gaming & Virtual Production Evangelist, Director of Product Marketing at Perforce Software
headline: Gaming & Virtual Production Evangelist, Director of Product Marketing at Perforce Software
summary: High-energy, high-velocity marketing and product strategist working with organizations to create products and services to delight their end users. Katie has spent over a decade helping high-tech companies in various industries connect with the exact markets they seek to serve.

recommendations:
Louise Flynn

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Katie is a key member of the Customer marketing team at SolarWinds. As the key driver behind product line such as Alert Central, Katie has a keen understanding of how IT professional talk and act. She then translates into high-caliber campaigns.

Mary Chauvin

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Creative, intelligent, and honest.  Katie is a joy to work for.
